job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
NLP (Natural Language Processing) Machine Learning Engineer needed for AI/Security Platform as a Service software company in Lehi, Utah - Full-time, full benefits, great compensation

This Jobot Job is hosted by Patrick Murray

Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button and sending us your resume.

A Bit About Us

Based in the Salt Lake City area, we are an established and ever-growing AI/Documentation Security Platform as a Service company that was established in 1999. We have grown to over 250+ employees Worldwide and are a recognized leader in in Cloud security and management.

We are currently looking for a strong Machine Learning Engineer with NLP experience to join our growing AI team. The Machine Learning Developer / AI Engineer will design and implement Natural Language Processing algorithms and deploy them into production at scale. It is a pivotal role for our company and product!

If this sounds interesting, please apply today!



Why join us?

  • Competitive Base Salary
  • Extremely Competitive Benefits Package
  • Flexible Work Schedules
  • Accelerated Career Growth
  • Excellent PTO
  • Steady, Stable, Growing Company
  • Modern Environment
  • State of the Art Technology
Job Details

What you need to be successful
  • PhD/MS in Computer Science, Information Retrieval, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing or a related discipline
  • 3-8+ years of experience
  • A solid foundation in computer science, with strong competencies in data structures, algorithms, and software design.
  • Industry experience of building and producing innovative end-to-end Machine Learning systems
  • Excellent programming skills in Python, experience using API Flask (REST) in production environment
  • Excellent written and spoken communication skills
Ideally what you've done
  • Experience in development of large-scale NLP systems in a large industrial or government environment
  • Experience with developing microservices with Docker and Kubernetes to serve machine learning models
  • Experience with Azure/Google Cloud Platform / Amazon Web Services
  • Experience with Flask, Apache Spark, Apache Kafka, Redis is a plus
Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button.
